Ocean Development Indicators in R using the UN Global SDG Database 1 Ocean Development Indicators in R 1.1 Training Objectives

Ocean Development Indicators in R using the UN Global SDG Database Dr Lucas Hertzog 2024-05-16 1 Ocean Development Indicators in R Welcome to the course on Ocean Development Indicators in R. This book provides all the necessary materials and instructions. 1.1 Training Objectives Learn to extract, clean, and analyse data from the UN Global SDG Database using R and the UNSD SDG API. Provide foundational knowledge on interacting with GitHub using R within the workshop context. Enable participants to build indicators informed by global standards but tailored to their specific contexts.

2 Setup 2.1 Windows users: Download and install R: https://cran.r-project.org/bin/windows/base/R-4.4.0-win.exe Download and install RStudio: https://download1.rstudio.org/electron/windows/RStudio-2024.04.1-748.exe Download and install Git: https://github.com/git-for-windows/git/releases/download/v2.45.1.windows.1/Git-2.45.1-64-bit.exe
3 Introduction This chapter provides an introduction to ocean development indicators and the UN Global SDG Database.
